reviews.review:
Out of all the over-stuffed super hero films that have come from the DC or Marvel universes, this one most expertly handles the overwhelming task of integrating and investing the characters in a very efficient and effective way. For me, I've never enjoyed the films that have too many heroes running around. I normally leave the theater feeling stressed because all the character interactions were rushed or just too forced. However, Infinity War is able to rely on many varying films for it's already-solid groundwork, allowing the story to thrust the viewer forward from scene after scene without being confused. Amazingly, even with the dizzying amount of heroes in this flick, the writers and directors were able to have them coexist while not getting smushed. Most of the characters retained a piece of their story arc, and an independent voice; a marvelous feat to achieve indeed.

The jaw-dropping ending of this film was the beautiful, gutsy nail in the coffin. It added so much weight to the story, something I've never felt that much of after leaving a Marvel flick (normally there's a laugh or two).

Superbly written. Excellently directed. This is everything you expect a multi-hero blockbuster to be.

I phenomenal performance by the one and only Peter Dinklage for making a big splash with such a small part. Bravo I say, for finding a way into the Marvel Cinematic Universe and upstaging every well established hero thus far. My only regret is that we may not get to see more Dinklage in future showings. I give it five “Soul Stones” out of five
This was an awesome movie! I loved it! Can’t wait for the next one. Gonna see it again soon.
Very! Very! Disappointed at this travesty called Avengers, What a waste of money

How do you even top that? That shit was insane. Feels bad for one of my favorite characters. That scene was sad. I didn't expect that much action in those 2 hours and 30 minutes and I enjoyed every second of it. It's just insane how it all went down. It's so cool seeing everything come to life and all the new suit and tech. The fight scenes were also alll incredibly well done and action packed. This movie really is a thriller.
A really great movie entertaining to the very end and not with your typical ending.
It was a good movie but they could have made it better
This movie had the best emotions, and excitement ever and it's the best marvel movie ever i give it 6/5.
Left off on bad guy winning kind of boring and lame
An amazing and ambitious outing for one of the biggest comic book corporations out there. It was worth sitting through 17 films to obtain the information necessary to fully enjoy this movie.
